name: Duyen Nguyen
about:
I am hard-working, responsible and always up for new challenges. "What you get by achieving your goals, is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals" is my motto. That's why I always want to seek ways to improve myself day by day.

My objective is to employ my knowledge and experience with the intention of securing a professional career with opportunity for challenges and career advancement, while gaining knowledge of new skills and expertise.

experiences.description:
A 100% foreign owned company (HO – Canada) specialized in insurance and financial services.

- Track and monitor actual IT expenses vs budget and proactively address concerns to manager and related person in charged

- Coordinate with Financial Accounting in monthly/ quarterly/ year-end closing, undertake pre- and post-closing review to ensure IT expenses are in line with IT budget

- Reviewing the IT chargebacks and processing payments for them

- Prepare for forecasting & budgeting and ensure actions & follow-ups are taken to address

- Support in providing frequent, ad-hoc expense reports and other reports as per requests

- Coordinate with related department & functions and support IT team on required processes & activities of the company 

- Ad-hoc works as requested by management

A 100% foreign owned company (HO – Singapore) specialized in e-commerce industry.

- Be in charge of making payment for vendors and claim for employee: review and check the validity and completeness of supporting documents
- Carry out month-end closing: booking invoices, payments and other preparing and booking GL entries to accounting system
- Reconcile between reports from accounting system and accounting ledgers 
- Assist in preparing Financial Statement for month-end closing: balance sheet, income statement
- Prepare reports about the variance of expenses between the current month and last month; actual expense and forecast
- Prepare tax declarations (VAT and FCT) monthly and quarterly
- Review and give advices about financial term on contracts of other departments
- Working with external audit, tax consultant, banks and tax authorities
- Design and monitor AP processes: payment for vendor process, reimbursement for staff process, contract reviewing process, work from home process,...
- Cross-functional working with Marketing, Human Resources, Procurement, Technical teams... in matters relating financial and accounting
- Ad-hoc works as requested by management.
